title: How do I use NFC to transfer files?
answer:
1.l Enable NFC. If you are using the China Mobile-customized phone, you need to turn on the P2P switch. 

[![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40ce1_2upfe.png)](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40ce1_2upfe.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.

2.l Open an image in the Gallery or open the contact details of a contact. Then, place two phones with the antennas close to each other. 

[![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40ce2_rwgyb.png)](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40ce2_rwgyb.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.

3.l When your phone detects that it is close to NFC phone, the screen of the image or contact information is zoomed out and displays the information about file transfer by touching. You can touch the screen at this time to transfer the file to the peer phone. 

4.l After the file transfer is started, you can separate two phones.
